snippet: The Malaysian police said they were in a standoff in the eastern state of Sabah with at least 80 militiamen from the Philippines who were seeking to stay by right of historic claims on the island of Borneo.
abstract: Malaysian police say they are in standoff on Borneo with at least 80 militiamen from Philippines who were seeking to stay on island by right of historic claims.
lead_paragraph: The Malaysian police said they were in a standoff in the eastern state of Sabah with at least 80 militiamen from the Philippines who were seeking to stay by right of historic claims on the island of Borneo.

headline.seo: Malaysians Encircle Militia Intruders From Philippines
headline.main: Malaysians Encircle Militia Intruders From Philippines
headline.print_headline: 80 Filipinos And Police Face Off In Malaysia
